name: ng2-radio-group
description: Checkbox group and radio group control for your angular2 applications using bootstrap3.
readme:
# ng2-radio-group Checkbox group and radio group control for your angular2 applications using bootstrap3. Does not depend of jquery. ## Installation `npm install ng2-radio-group --save` ## Usage There are two components. First is a checkboxes group that allows you to select multiple options for a single model. ```html Rating Date Watch count Comment count ``` Second is a radio inputs group that allows you to select single option for a single model. ```html Rating Date Watch count Comment count ``` ## Sample Complete example of usage: ```javascript import {Component} from "angular2/core"; import {RADIO_GROUP_DIRECTIVES} from "ng2-radio-group/ng2-radio-group"; @Component({ selector: "app", template: ` Sort by: Rating Date Watch count Comment count Order by: Rating Date Watch count Comment count
Selected sorting types: {{ sortBy }}
Selected order types: {{ order }}
`, directives: [RADIO_GROUP_DIRECTIVES] }) export class App { sortBy: string = "date"; orderBy: string[] = ["watches", "comments"]; } ``` Take a look on samples in [./sample](https://github.com/pleerock/ng2-radio-group/tree/master/sample) for more examples of usages.
